Package simulation.montecarlo

Class ReadInteractionsTable

java.lang.Object
simulation.montecarlo.ReadInteractionsTable
Direct Known Subclasses:
ReadInteractionsTableFe8, ReadInteractionsTableLiHoF4
public abstract class ReadInteractionsTable extends Object
Reads the interaction between pairs of spins from a file

    • receiveIntTable

      public static void receiveIntTable​(double[][][] intTable, int Lx, int Lz)
      Receive the interactions table for an undiluted system
      Parameters:
      intTable - interaction table array to fill
      Lx - number of unit cells in the x and y directions
      Lz - number of unit cells in the z direction

    • receiveIntTable

      public static void receiveIntTable​(double[][][] intTable, int Lx, int Lz, boolean[] dilution)
      Receive the interactions table for a diluted system. The interactions table is a 2D symmetric array which holds in cell [i,j] the interaction between spins i and j. There are 3 such arrays (first dimension of intTable) which hold the xz, yz and zz interactions in that order. The file only holds half of the symmetric array (incl. the diagonal) but the values read fill the full symmetric array.
      Parameters:
      intTable - interaction table array to fill
      Lx - number of unit cells in the x and y directions
      Lz - number of unit cells in the z direction
      dilution - boolean array which indicates which spins exist and which do not

    • exchangeInt

      public abstract int[][] exchangeInt​(double[][] intTable, int Lx, int Ly, int Lz, double J_ex)
      Calculates the zz exchange interaction with nearest neighbors and also returns an array of nearest neighbors
      Parameters:
      intTable - exchange interaction array to fill
      Lx - number of unit cells in the x directions
      Ly - number of unit cells in the y directions
      Lz - number of unit cells in the z directions
      J_ex - strength of the exchange interaction
      Returns:
      array of nearest neighbors: cell [i,j] hold the index (in the compact array) of the j-th neighbor of spin i

    • addExchangeToNeighbor

      static void addExchangeToNeighbor​(int focusSpin, int[] neighbors, int[][] nnArray, boolean[][] nnArray_test, double[][] intTable, double J_ex)
      Adds the exchange interaction to the neighbors of the given spin and adds them as its neighbors in nnArray
      Parameters:
      focusSpin - spin in focus
      neighbors - array of the neighbors of focusSpin, by their compact indices
      nnArray - array of nearest neighbors to fill
      nnArray_test - full 2D array used to indicate the spins i and j (compact indices) are neighbors by having the cells [i,j] and [j,i] set to true.
      intTable - array of exchange interaction to fill
      J_ex - strength of the exchange interaction
